bug.author: shantanuchhabra
bug.summary: Double Quotes in labels during Annotation
bug.description:
Adding double quotes in the labels while annotating makes the label look like â€œlabel" when I would expect it to be like "label". See: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14062641/53992749-7c144300-40e2-11e9-963e-40e9c2b0beb9.png></denchmark-link>
and <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14062641/53992775-8c2c2280-40e2-11e9-877d-a44ad464ef35.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
This is actually an autocorrect issue! Note, the label below actually has the correct quotations! <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4616962/57158534-8aa47100-6d98-11e9-9c17-850b487ae43f.png></denchmark-link>
The label at first autocorrects to the secondary quote. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4616962/57158587-a445b880-6d98-11e9-8eb8-487f521226d1.png></denchmark-link>
But the user can actually go back and recorrect them! <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4616962/57158630-bc1d3c80-6d98-11e9-9722-f9e485fe1fa6.png></denchmark-link>
Good luck! Closing the issue for now!
